snippet: Everybody complains about the traffic, but no one does anything about it. That may finally be changing as new technology to track cars becomes more widely used.
abstract: Smartphone apps from Inrix, Waze and TomTom are making inroads into technology that gathers live information on the speed and location of vehicles on the road and transmits traffic conditions to drivers so they can avoid problems.
lead_paragraph: Everybody complains about the traffic, but no one does anything about it. That may finally be changing as new technology to track cars becomes more widely used.

headline.seo: In Traffic? Next Time, Use an App
headline.main: In Traffic? Next Time, Use an App
headline.print_headline: In Traffic? Next Time, Use an App
